org.jruyi.io

Interface IFloatCodec


  • public interface IFloatCodec
    This interface defines all the methods a float codec has to implement.
    See Also:
    FloatCodec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float get(IUnitChain unitChain, int index)
      Decodes the bytes from the specified unitChain, starting at the specified index in the current unit, to a float value and returns the resultant float value.
      void prepend(float f, IUnitChain unitChain)
      Encodes the specified float value f and writes the resultant bytes to the head of the specified unitChain.
      float read(IUnitChain unitChain)
      Decodes the bytes from the specified unitChain, starting at position in the current unit, to a float value and returns the resultant float value.
      void set(float f, IUnitChain unitChain, int index)
      Encodes the specified float value f and sets the resultant bytes to the specified unitChain starting at the specified index in the current unit.
      void write(float f, IUnitChain unitChain)
      Encodes the specified float value f and writes the resultant bytes to the end of the specified unitChain.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        float read(IUnitChain unitChain)
        Decodes the bytes from the specified unitChain, starting at position in the current unit, to a float value and returns the resultant float value.
        Parameters:
        unitChain - the bytes from which to be decoded
        Returns:
        the decoded float value
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - if there's not enough data remaining in the unitChain

      • write

        void write(float f,
         IUnitChain unitChain)
        Encodes the specified float value f and writes the resultant bytes to the end of the specified unitChain.
        Parameters:
        f - the float value to be encoded
        unitChain - the unit chain where the encoded bytes to be written to

      • get

        float get(IUnitChain unitChain,
        int index)
        Decodes the bytes from the specified unitChain, starting at the specified index in the current unit, to a float value and returns the resultant float value.
        Parameters:
        unitChain - the bytes from which to be decoded
        index - the offset of the first byte in the current unit to be decoded
        Returns:
        the decoded float value
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of bounds

      • set

        void set(float f,
       IUnitChain unitChain,
       int index)
        Encodes the specified float value f and sets the resultant bytes to the specified unitChain starting at the specified index in the current unit.
        Parameters:
        f - the float value to be encoded
        unitChain - the unit chain where the encoded bytes to be set to
        index - the offset of the first byte in the current unit to be set
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of bounds

      • prepend

        void prepend(float f,
           IUnitChain unitChain)
        Encodes the specified float value f and writes the resultant bytes to the head of the specified unitChain.
        Parameters:
        f - the float value to be encoded
        unitChain - the unit chain where the encoded bytes to be prepended to
